name: Pineapple Pinecone Candle
description:
SOLD OUT! These lovely candles will be available again in September 2014!    

These delicious smelling candles are $29 (large) & $21 (small) and make a great hostess, birthday or holiday gift! 

The large candle includes a metal candle plate for the candle to sit on.

name: Lake House or Beach House Sign
description:
Take me to the beach ... or the lake ... just take me to the water! 

Decorative hand painted subway art sign for any beach or lake lover. White background with black lettering painted on finished wood.

24" l x 6" h

name: Coastal Blue Sea Prints, Set of 4
description:
Prints are mounted and raised on wooden backboards for a 3-dimensional effect then mounted to antique stained burlap. Frames have medium gray undertones with heavily distressed black topcoat and a heavy gray wash.

15" w x 18"h x 1" d

Set of 4 prints.

name: GoVino Wine Glasses & Champagne Flutes
description:
"Shakeâ€¦ it won't break"! Our favorite go anywhere plastic wine glasses are a must have. They are perfect for drinks by the pool, concerts in the park and make a great hostess gift!

They even have a ergonomic thumb notch for cozy handling.  

Each style comes in a set of four glasses.                                    

**Not dishwasher safe, hand wash only.**


Wine Glasses: 3.5" w x 4.5" h

31" H , 18" w x 10" d

name: Anchor Tote Bag - Indoor/Outdoor
description:
Say, "Ahoy, matey!" to our fresh new nautical tote bags in easy-clean polypropylene, with adorable appliqued anchors on each side. Lightweight and roomy, with a wide opening and durable handles and bottoms. 

Available in Red or Navy

22" square

description:

Set of 3.

name: Dash & Albert Rugs
description:
Dash & Albert Rugs are the best! As seen in Coastal Living, Better Homes and Gardens, and designer magazines. Great collection of indoor/outdoor, cotton, and wool. Indoor/outdoor rugs are great for high traffic areas, entry ways or as a kitchen runner. Dash & Albert also offers throw blankets, outdoor pillows, and tote bags. We have the full line of swatches in store to see colors and check out samples. You can also contact the store for additional sizes in the rugs listed below.

Visit www.dashandalbert.com to view the full line of designs offered for purchase at Chartreuse. Our favorites are featured here to puchase online, but feel free to call store to place an order for anything you see online at www.dashandalbert.com.  

Rug patterns are listed in the same order as the pictures.
Approximate delivery time: 2-3 weeks
Custom orders may not be exchanged or returned.
